description: PM Modi campaigns in Tamil Nadu, urges people to elect a BJP Government Tamil Nadu has been gripped in corruption. Our aim is to free the state from corruption: PM Modi Prominent state leaders have
caption: nm-4.com
message:
In the rallies in Hosur & Chennai, talked about why a vote for BJP is a vote for progress & a vote for TN’s growth.

Tamil Nadu must be free from corruption. For some leaders from TN, the priority was 2G scam, our priority is to create a ‘Digital India.’ Elaborated on initiatives of Centre that are benefiting the poor, farmers, youngsters, neo-middle class & are enhancing India’s growth. http://nm-4.com/vpeo
